# MLBoundingBoxAnchor.topLeft

**Case**

An anchor at the bounding box’s top-left corner.

## Declaration

```swift
case topLeft
```

## Designating anchors

- **MLBoundingBoxAnchor.center**: An anchor at the bounding box’s center point.
- **MLBoundingBoxAnchor.bottomLeft**: An anchor at the bounding box’s bottom-left corner.
